entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 1:52 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: W 23 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
